tool.name: White space tokenizer
tool.help:
**What it does**
A basic tokenizer that splits tokens on whitespace boundaries.
**Input**
Any text in a `LIF Container <http://wiki.lappsgrid.org/org.lappsgrid.serialization/groovydoc/org/lappsgrid/serialization/lif/Container.html>`_.
**Output**
Annotations for * http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token
